post:
[ConstantVPS](http://constantvps.com) is pleased to offer our June VPS specials:


**PROMO CODE: Use promo "WHT50" during checkout for 50% OFF the first month!!** 


**PROMO CODE: Use promo "WHT25" during checkout for 25% OFF recurring every month !!.**

We are getting several more locations, very soon

**GIFT : First 20 signups with coupon code** : **T2WSEHAT37** are getting exclusive bonus 30 GB on their vps(Note : It will need some time our staff to review your order and associate your bonus space.)

[ConstantVPS](http://constantvps.com) offers unmanaged VPS hosting bundled with industry leading software on branded server grade hardware packed with ECC-RAM and RAID-10 Drives. Our systems use KVM Hardware virtualization for advanced dedicated reservation of resources for the VM. Full root access and SolusVM VPS control panel included. Simple, no frills, cost-effective VPS hosting.

**All prices are final, no setup or hidden fees, no minimum term contracts, month-to-month subscription payments, anytime cancellation!**

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

**ConstantVPS Features:**

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
- Full Hardware Virtualization

- 99.9% uptime SLA incl. compensation for outage
